thread.title: Syrian director hopes documentary will "write history"

title: Syrian director hopes documentary will "write history"
text:
Syrian director hopes documentary will "write history" 10:58pm GMT - 01:14 
Director Firas Fayyad hopes his Oscar-nominated documentary ''Last Men in Aleppo'' will help ''write history.'' Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
